summary: After a police team kills his brother, a drug-dealing gangster vows to kill the entire team and their respective families.
cast: Suriya|Jyotika|'University' Jeevan|Daniel Balaji|Vivek Anand|Devadarshini Chetan|Sethu Rajan|Yog Japi|Ramya Krishnan|Clive Dev|Yog Japee|Gautham Vasudev Menon
title: Kaakha..Kaakha: The Police
